I did an anagram search of "death":

He'd Ta.                                Hate d.
Ah! Ted.                                T head.

The. A d.                               Eh! d at.

D Thea.                                 Ae Thd.
Eh! Ta! d.                              He, d at.
Ta! he, d.                              A Ted H.

Hat d e.                                D H ate.
D H tea.                                Eat d H.

D H eta.                                T dah e.
T DAE H.                                Ha! t d e.
D H at e.                               Ah! t d e.
Ta! d H e.                              T d H Ea.
T, ae d H.                              A t d H e.

Here's an anagram search of "Hades":
Shade.
Heads.
A shed.
Eh! sad.
'e's had.
He sad.
As he'd.
'a! shed.
'e, dash.
She, 'ad.
A she'd.
He's. 'ad.
'e's. Had.
'as he'd.
Ash 'e'd.
Has 'e'd.
Dash e.
She'd 'a.

If anything sticks out, let me know.
I am leaning towards "Sun Bai" or "Nibaus" as the god of Death.

Admittedly, I am probably going to use this same list to pick out a 
name for the archmage opponent.
